cast.overview: In December 2004, close-knit family Maria, Henry and their three sons begin their winter vacation in Thailand. But the day after Christmas, the idyllic holiday turns into an incomprehensible nightmare when a terrifying roar rises from the depths of the sea, followed by a wall of black water that devours everything in its path. Though Maria and her family face their darkest hour, unexpected displays of kindness and courage ameliorate their terror.
cast.title: The Impossible

cast.original_title: ฉลาดเกมส์โกง
cast.overview: Lynn, a brilliant student, after helping her friends to get the grades they need, develops the idea of starting a much bigger exam-cheating business.
cast.title: Bad Genius

also_known_as: สฤญรัตน์ โทมัส
details.biography: Sarinrat Thomas, nicknamed Jear, is a drama therapist, actress, acting coach, model, MC and self-development workshop facilitator. She graduated and qualified as a drama therapist in the UK in 2000 and has a Master degree in Psychotherapy and Counselling. Sarinrar moved to York, UK in 2017. She acted as an operating nurse in the film The Impossible (2012).
details.name: Sarinrat Thomas
